mapper.select: select master.count, display_cn as title from ( select count(member_id) count, type from mmb_master where deleted = '0' and is_valid = '0' group by type order by type ) master left join com_code cc on cc.code = 'MEMBER_LEVEL' and cc.value = master.type and cc.deleted = '0'

select count(member_id) count, to_char(insert_time, 'yyyy-MM') AS title from mmb_master where deleted = '0' and is_valid = '0' and to_char(now() + interval '-1 years', 'yyyy-MM') < to_char(insert_time, 'yyyy-MM') group by title order by title

select count(order_id) count, sum(amount_totle) amount, to_char(pay_time, 'yyyy-MM') AS title from ord_master where deleted = '0' and pay_status = '20' and to_char(now() + interval '-1 years', 'yyyy-MM') < to_char(pay_time, 'yyyy-MM') group by title order by title

select goods.count, gds.goods_name title, gds.goods_code code from ( select sum(sub.quantity) count, sub.goods_id goods_id from ord_sub_list sub INNER join ord_master master on sub.order_id = master.order_id and master.pay_status = '20' and master.deleted = '0' where sub.deleted = '0' group by sub.goods_id order by count DESC limit 10 ) goods left join gds_master gds on gds.goods_id = goods.goods_id
